metadata.description: Comprehensive collection of CLI tools from Apache, CNCF, Blockchain, and Development ecosystems
metadata.source: Consolidated from Apache Foundation, CNCF Landscape, Web3/Blockchain projects, and popular development tools

properties.source_repo: Source repository information (type and repo path)
properties.image_repo: Container image repository information (type and full image path)
properties.category: Tool category classification (Apache, CNCF, Blockchain, or specific tool type)
properties.source_releases: Available releases/versions from source repository (up to 5 most recent)
properties.image_tags: Available container image tags (up to 5 most recent)

categories.Other: Development tools, system utilities, and other CLI tools

notes: Consolidated from 4 separate config files on 2025-12-08
All tools include up to 5 most recent releases and image tags
Tools are sorted alphabetically by name
Removed 25 deprecated and 19 CLI-only tools on 2025-12-08

cli_tools.name: act
cli_tools.description: Run your GitHub Actions locally Why would you want to do this.
cli_tools.notes: GHCR package requires authentication or is not publicly accessible

cli_tools.name: Activemq
cli_tools.description: High-performance message broker supporting multiple protocols and messaging patterns.

cli_tools.name: Aeraki Mesh
cli_tools.description: Aeraki Mesh allows you to manage any layer-7 traffic in a service mesh.

cli_tools.name: Airflow
cli_tools.description: Workflow orchestration platform for programmatically authoring, scheduling, and monitoring data pipelines.

cli_tools.name: Akri
cli_tools.description: Kubernetes Resource Interface for the Edge - discovers and utilizes leaf devices (sensors, controllers, MCUs) across heterogeneous edge clusters.

cli_tools.name: Ansible
cli_tools.description: Automation platform for configuration management, application deployment, and task automation.

cli_tools.name: Antrea
cli_tools.description: Kubernetes networking solution based on Open vSwitch, providing network connectivity and security for pod workloads with native support for NetworkPolicy.

cli_tools.name: Ape Framework
cli_tools.description: Framework for testing and deploying smart contracts with Python.

cli_tools.name: APISIX

cli_tools.name: Aptos

cli_tools.name: Arbitrum
cli_tools.description: Layer 2 scaling solution for Ethereum using optimistic rollups.

cli_tools.name: Argo
cli_tools.description: Kubernetes-native tools to run workflows, manage clusters, and do GitOps right.

cli_tools.name: Armada

cli_tools.name: Artifact Hub
